if(command.startsWith("suggest")) { sendMessage("Sending..."); sendMessage("Suggestion succesfully sent."); BufferedWriter bw = null; String suggestion = command.substring(8); try { bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("suggestions.txt", true)); bw.write(playerName+": "+suggestion); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch (IOException ioe) { ioe.printStackTrace(); } finally { if (bw != null) try { bw.close(); } catch (IOException ioe2) { sendMessage("Error Suggesting"); } } }
